El Salvador's Bukele looks set to cruise to controversial presidential reelection -pollEl Salvador's Nayib Bukele holds a large lead ahead of his bid next month to win reelection as president, a poll showed on Tuesday, as one Latin America's most popular leaders rides a wave of support for his hardline security policies. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 18:53:14 GMT FNF2LLZLVRO3TPPH5FTAQFDBFQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/el-salvadors-bukele-looks-set-cruise-controversial-presidential-reelection-poll-2024-01-16/Nelson Renteria世界美洲
Thousands rally in Serbia to protest election outcomeThousands of opposition supporters rallied peacefully in the Serbian capital Belgrade on Tuesday in an anti-government protest to demand the annulment of last month's elections, which were described by international observers as unfair. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 18:51:38 GMT X4XQVPCJCJIADLKGEM6U4KPDFI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/thousands-rally-serbia-protest-election-outcome-2024-01-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Migrant boat arrivals to Spain nearly quadruple in JanuaryThe number of migrants entering Spain irregularly by sea has jumped nearly 300% so far in January from the same period in 2023, with the vast majority arriving in the Canary Islands, official data showed on Tuesday. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 18:38:02 GMT S53T3KKEK5PN3KZ2CDJCHDUHDA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/migrant-boat-arrivals-spain-nearly-quadruple-january-2024-01-16/Catarina Demony世界欧洲
Jordan's PM says peace with Israel remains strategic choice despite Gaza warJordan's Prime Minister Bisher al Khasawaneh said on Tuesday that peace with Israel remained a strategic choice but any push to drive Palestinians to the kingdom would pose an "existentialist" threat. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 18:34:53 GMT C2WN3HFQY5OLTFRDSQHGC3F6HY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/jordans-pm-says-peace-with-israel-remains-strategic-choice-despite-gaza-war-2024-01-16/Reuters商业达沃斯
German government considers delivery of tank ammunition to Israel - SpiegelGermany's government is considering the delivery of tank ammunition to Israel to support it in its fight against Hamas, according to German magazine Der Spiegel on Tuesday. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 18:28:21 GMT HEAGIUZ5JVKMZO6YQB5INWSFJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/german-government-considers-delivery-tank-ammunition-israel-spiegel-2024-01-16/Reuters世界
Comoros' president extends rule after latest poll victoryComoros' President Azali Assoumani won a fourth five-year term after being declared by the country's electoral body on Tuesday as the winner of Sunday's election in which he contested against five opponents. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 18:24:17 GMT K2JHKR3IQFPI3DUIQWN4J6F5BA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/comoros-president-extends-rule-after-latest-poll-victory-2024-01-16/Reuters世界非洲
Forty Tunisian migrants missing after setting off in a boat toward Italy coastAbout 40 Tunisian migrants were missing after setting off in a boat toward the Italy coast last week, the national guard said on Tuesday. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 18:22:28 GMT RNUMPGTMWVO6VCS5TRLMKKFONY https://www.reuters.com/world/40-tunisian-migrants-missing-after-setting-off-boat-toward-italy-coast-2024-01-16/Reuters世界
Woman accused of killing Russian war blogger says handler lied about bombA Russian woman accused of assassinating a prominent pro-war blogger told a court on Tuesday she had thought the package she handed to him in a St Petersburg cafe contained a listening device, not a bomb. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 18:07:44 GMT PUDAOLMIKBJQHICJBFVTTYUANA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/woman-accused-killing- Russian-war-blogger-says-handler-lied-about-bomb-2024-01-16/Mark Trevelyan世界欧洲
Saudi Arabia has not yet joined BRICs - ministerSaudi Arabia has not yet officially joined the BRICs bloc of developing countries, the kingdom's minister of commerce said in a panel at the World Economic Forum in Davos on Tuesday. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 18:03:24 GMT SLKJH47ZCFOWDLFMVGWNKVYMYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/saudi-arabia-has-not-yet-joined-brics-minister-2024-01-16/Pesha Magid商业达沃斯
Stolen Picasso, Chagall paintings worth $ 900.000 found in Antwerp houseBelgian police have found stolen Picasso and Chagall paintings in a basement in the city of Antwerp, local authorities said on Tuesday, adding that the artworks are still in good condition. France sees collapse in births to lowest since World War TwoFrance saw the lowest number of births since World War Two last year, the national statistics agency INSEE said, in a blow to its traditionally strong demographic profile.
